related_questions.question: Can you be an artist without a degree?
related_questions.snippet: The medium used could be paint, clay, metal or any material needed to complete the project. Many people who are interested in art go to school for a Master of Fine Arts degree. However, an art degree is not necessary to gain notoriety in the art world and become a respected artist.
